org.grobid.core.layout

Class Block

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.grobid.core.layout.Block

  • public class Block
extends Object
    Class for representing and exchanging a document block. A block is defined here relatively to some properties in the document layout.
    Author:
    Patrice Lopez
